text: Bohdan Eduardovych Strontsitsky (; born 13 January 1968) is a retired Soviet and Ukrainian professional footballer. ==References== ==External links== * * Strontsitsky at allplayers.in.ua Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Lviv Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Krystal Kherson players Category:FC Skala Stryi (1911) players Category:FC Karpaty Lviv players Category:FC Karpaty-2 Lviv players Category:FC Karpaty-3 Lviv players Category:SC Tavriya Simferopol players Category:FC Spartak Ivano- Frankivsk players Category:FC Kalush players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Nyva Ternopil managers Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Bohdan Strontsitsky
